response.job_title: I am a risk manager with a strong scientific background and over 12 years of experience
response.summary:
I am a risk manager with a strong scientific background and over 12 years of experience in the
industrial and service sectors. My main focus has been on risk management and the implementation of engineering solutions that minimize occupational risks and optimize processes. To achieve this, I use scientific tools such as risk optimization mathematical models, data analiysis, and advanced technology to identify, analyze, and evaluate risks in industrial and service processes. As a leader of professionals, I have managed multidisciplinary teams and directed engineering projects to ensure worker safety and process optimization. I have also developed skills in data analysis and applied statistics to make informed decisions.

I have special knowledge in project management, collective intelligence, data analysis, optimization, materials, and design. Furthermore, I am an expert in industrial hygiene and integral design of workstations, using data analysis models to identify and evaluate risks associated with industrial processes
